wikipedia_page.main: Stephen Hubert Peet (16 February 1920 – 22 December 2005) was an English filmmaker, best known as a pioneer of illustrated oral history and his BBC television series Yesterday's Witness (1969–1981).

**Stephen Peet, British filmmaker and producer of the TV program Yesterday's Witness (d. 2006)
Stephen Peet subsequently made many more documentary films for BBC TV, with the series title Yesterday's witness.
